title: Bugsplat
body: When I start a game it bug splats and continues to everytime i try to reconnect. This has been happening since the downtime about 30 mins ago. have never had this problem before.

replies.body: Have you tried the **Repair** tool in the patcher?

I have been having the same problem, halfway through banning the champions in a ranked game, and then bam. I havent been able to get on league since due to my own problem in the discussion that i created not long ago.
